result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Patricia Ann Hopkins

records.addlTxt: Event entered to cancel warrant out of CCAP to enter warrant as ordered today.

2:02 PM Cases 15CF132, 2015CF000194, 2015CT000054, 2015CT000076, and 2015CT000080 called together.  Defendant Patricia Ann Hopkins not in court.  Attorney James Jay Rennicke Esq in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Daniel P Repka appeared by video for Patricia Ann Hopkins. Court recaps case.  State requests forfeiture of any cash and for warrant.  Atty Repka stands mute.  Court orders warrant, Nationwide, forfeits cash bond posted.  Atty Repka notes he intends to stay the attorney of record on these files and will keep court updated if he gets new information.
Plea/sentencing hearing on July 26, 2022 at 01:45 pm.

11:06 AM 2015CF000194, 2015CT000054, 2015CT000076, and 2015CT000080 called together.  Prosecuting attorney James Jay Rennicke Esq in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Daniel P Repka appeared by video for Patricia Ann Hopkins. Cases on for Status Conference.  Defense attorney updates the Court: defendant has MN warrant and no contact with def since last appearance.  Court will reset a plea/sentencing date.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for July 26, 2022 at 01:45 pm.
Status conference on July 14, 2022 at 11:00 am.

4:11 PM Cases 15CF132, 2015CF000194, 2015CT000054, 2015CT000076, and 2015CT000080 called together.  Prosecuting attorney James Jay Rennicke Esq in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Patricia Ann Hopkins not in court.  Attorney Daniel P Repka in court for Patricia Ann Hopkins. Cases were set for plea/sentencing.  Def fails to appear.  Atty Repka updates: def working on issues in Washington County
Status conference scheduled for July 14, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing on July 11, 2022 at 03:45 pm.

1:21 PM 2015CF000194, 2015CT000054, 2015CT000076, 2015CT000080, and 15CF132 called together.  Prosecuting attorney Kevin Thomas Schmidt in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Patricia Ann Hopkins not in court.  Attorney Daniel P Repka appeared by video for Patricia Ann Hopkins. Case on for Status Conference.  Court had excused the def for today.  Court makes record.  Defense attorney updates the Court: def on probation in Washington County, ready to set a plea/sentencing.  Offer recited by Atty Schmidt: plead to Ct 2 as a (MA) in 15CF132 and OAR in 15CT54; DRI remaining; joint rec for court costs and restitution.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for July 11, 2022 at 03:45 pm.
Returned Notice of Hearing for 6-24-2022. "Attempted - Not Known."
State's Discovery Demand

records.addlTxt: Status conference on June 24, 2022 at 01:15 pm.
$333.19 cash bond is ordered to cover warrants in Burnett County Cases 15CT80, 15CT76, 15CT54, 15CF194, and 15CF132.
Amended bond on the warrants has been posted in full.
Only Judge may quash this warrant.
Defendant Patricia A Hopkins not in court.  William Lund Norine appeared for the State of Wisconsin. The Court defaults def. in her TR cases's. payment within 30 days.

Attorney Joel Kenneth Larimore in court.  William Lund Norine appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Numerous cases called. Atty Larimore states Def has car trouble. State requests stayed warrant  The Court authorizes warrant $100 for release.  Status conference scheduled for May 10, 2018 at 10:00 am.

records.addlTxt: Status conference on March 22, 2018 at 09:00 am.

Defendant, Patricia Ann Hopkins, appeared with Attorney Joel Kenneth Larimore.  Attorney William Lund Norine appeared for the State. All open cases called. Attorney Larimore updates the Court. No agreement today, expects to be resolved. State agrees. one more stc approved.  Status conference scheduled for March 22, 2018 at 09:00 am.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant, Patricia Ann Hopkins, appeared with Attorney Joel Kenneth Larimore.  Attorney William Lund Norine appeared for the State. Defendant waives prelim in cases 15CF132 and 15CF194, court examines defendant, finds makes waiver KFV and finds probable cause and binds over for further proceedings. State files information in 15CF132. Acknowledges receipt and enters not guilty pleas to all counts. Waives speedy trial. State files information in 15CF194, Acknowledges receipt and enters not guilty plea. Waives speedy trial.  Status conference scheduled for January 25, 2018 at 09:00 am.
